name: Notificare
author: Notificare

sections.description:
Website push notifications for WordPress websites. Send push notifications to your website visitors even when they are not at your website.

Start today automating how you notify your visitors about changes in your website, new blog posts or articles.

A complete set of features that your website is missing:

  • Send or schedule remote notifications in any modern browser
  • Easily divide your users in groups with segmentation
  • Location based messages for when your users are on the move
  • Automation tools for all your marketing efforts
sections.installation:
Get started today in a few simple steps:

  1. Signup for free with Notificare
  2. Use “Install Now” from the plugin Admin panel, or use the zip file through the plugin area in your WordPress installation
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  4. Configure the Notificare plugin according to our Documentation
  5. Implement your messaging strategy in our Dashboard
sections.faq:
Do I need to sign up to Notificare to use this plugin?

Yes. You can also try it for 30 days before considering a paid plan. You can upgrade or cancel it at anytime.

Do I need a Premium Support account?

No. But it is recommended. Our Premium Support plans allow you to contact our engineering team 24/7 through our help desk at support.notifica.re.

Which browsers support your notifications?

All the major browsers out there support our Website Push functionality. Recent versions of Chrome, Firefox, Opera, Edge and Safari support native notifications. All these combined make up for more than 90% of market share.
